${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AerialAssault.NAME: Aerial Assault
${modID}:AerialAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you are flying, deal !D! Damage again

${modID}:BloodMoney.NAME: Blood Money
${modID}:BloodMoney.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain that much gold.

${modID}:Charisma.NAME: Charisma
${modID}:Charisma.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy does not intend to attack, gain !M! gold.

${modID}:BreakTheBank.NAME: Break The Bank
${modID}:BreakTheBank.DESCRIPTION: Deal Damage Equal to the Amount of Gold you've gained this combat (!D!)

${modID}:Inheritance.NAME: Inheritance
${modID}:Inheritance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain !M! Gold

${modID}:HeroicLanding.NAME: Heroic Landing
${modID}:HeroicLanding.DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Apply !M! weak and !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies NL Exhaust

${modID}:EnergyBeam.NAME: Energy Beam
${modID}:EnergyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL ${modID}:Surplus NL Deal !${modID}:damage2! to two random enemies

${modID}:SpareCannon.NAME: Spare Cannon
${modID}:SpareCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL ${modID}:Surplus NL put this card on the top of your library

${modID}:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
${modID}:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL ${modID}:Surplus NL permanently increase the damage of this card by 1

${modID}:Invisible.NAME: Invisible
${modID}:Invisible.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, you don't lose block until you are attacked.

${modID}:Overload.NAME: Overload
${modID}:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Double your strength, you cant play attacks next turn (Exhaust)
${modID}:Overload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your strength, you cant play attacks next turn

${modID}:TimeTravel.NAME: Time Travel
${modID}:TimeTravel.DESCRIPTION: Gain life equal to how much life you lost last turn

${modID}:LithiumIon.NAME: Lithium Ion
${modID}:LithiumIon.DESCRIPTION: Energy is now conserved between turns

${modID}:Obliterate.NAME: Obliterate
${modID}:Obliterate.DESCRIPTION: Deal 15 Damage, if the enemy dies, deal damage equal to it's Max HP to all enemies
${modID}:Obliterate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 25 Damage, if the enemy dies, deal damage equal to it's Max HP to all enemies

${modID}:EliteBuster.NAME: Elite Buster
${modID}:EliteBuster.DESCRIPTION: You can no longer become Frail

${modID}:Infrastructure.NAME: Infrastructure
${modID}:Infrastructure.DESCRIPTION: Pay !${modID}:goldCost! Gold, Gain !${modID}:energyGain! Energy, draw !${modID}:cardDraw! cards

${modID}:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
${modID}:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable NL ${modID}:Surplus NL at the beginning of your next turn, draw !M! cards

${modID}:Reserve.NAME: Reserve
${modID}:Reserve.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable NL ${modID}:Surplus NL at the beginning of your next turn, Gain !M! Energy
